definitions.body: young lion;—´[[כ]] Ju Jdg 14:5 + 16 t.; pl. [[כְּפִרִים]] Je 2:15 + 3 t.; [[כְּפִירִים]] Zec 11:3 + 7 t.; sf. [[כְּפִירַיִח]] Na 2:14; [[כְּפִירֶיהָ]] Ez Eze 38:13 (Co rds. [[כנעניה]]);—lit. [[אֲרָיוֹת]] ´[[כ]] Ju Jdg 14:5 young lion of lions; Am 3:4, Ps 17:12. It differs from whelp [[גּוּר]] Ez Eze 19:2, Eze 19:3 as old enough to hunt its prey, Je 25:38, Is 11:6, Zec 11:3, Ps 104:21; in sim. of roar of hostile army Is 5:29 (‖[[לָבִיא ]]) cf. Je 51:38 (‖[[גּוֹרֵי אריות ]]); sim of ´[[י]]'s invincible might Is 31:4 (‖[[אַרְיֵה ]]); of Isr. among the nations, Mic 5:7; of Assyr. princes Na 2:12; of prince of Isr. Ez Eze 19:5, Eze 19:6; other cases are: ‖[[לָבִיא]] Job 38:39; ‖[[שַׁחַל]] Ho 5:14, Ps 91:13, Job 4:10; of bloodthirsty enemies Ps 34:11, Ps 35:17, Ps 58:7, Je 2:15; [[גוים]] ´[[כ]] Ez Eze 32:2, of young warriors Na 2:14, Ez Eze 38:13 (? ; v. Co supr.); righteous compared with, Pr 28:1; king's wrath like roaring of, Pr 19:12, Pr 20:2; of one of faces of cherubim Ez Eze 41:19.
